name: WorldBankKML
short_description: Transforming World Bank indicators to Google Earth's KML format. Several indicators are included. Just wanted to make these available to the public. Thanks to the World Bank for making their data public, and allowing researchers and developers to utilize it!
summary: Google Earth / World Bank KML Output
